metadata.name: Forever Love
metadata.description:
I photographed the incredible love of Uncle Hasan and Aunt Durkız. They live in Güdül District of Ankara Province, Turkey. Their marriage has been going on for exactly 62 years. On the same pillow for years. I had the chance to produce this photo during a trip. They hosted me and we chatted. The photo was taken during a coffee break. He received awards in many photography competitions. International orhan holding photography competition special award 2021 - Third place in Güdül Fotomarathon - Photocup photo of the year award 2021. It was also published in Turkey's leading newspapers and magazines. Hürriyet Kelebek 2021 - Pegasus aviation magazine 2021 - Reached millions on social media accounts and websites. It describes the purest and purest form of love. Unfortunately, it is very difficult to find such happy marriages and lives a

All photos in the collection I took with love will be sent to the first owner as 50×70 Printed and signed with a certificate of authenticity.

Edition :1/1
